title: Can I get the Victorious Sivir Skin through mystery gifting and/ or Hextech Boxes?
body:
Can I get the Victorious Sivir Skin through mystery gifting and/ or Hextech Boxes?
Is it possible in anyway to get that skin

replies.body:
Since Victorious Sivir is an achievement skin, you won't be able to get her from mystery gifting or hextech. This skin was given out to those that reached gold or higher in the 2015 Season. As of now, we don't have any plans to bring these skins to mystery gifting or hextech chests, since you needed to 'earn' them.

You can read up on what skins you can get on our [Mystery Gifting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ).
What if we could earn a Victorious Coin (loot) if we reach Gold or higher that we can then exchange for any one previous or new Victorious skin?
I like the idea of that
